message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.MM 

This paper is about using Hierarchical Multi-scale Attention Networks for action recognition in computer vision. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also proposes a novel attention mechanism and uses gradient estimation methods, which are related to machine learning and artificial intelligence, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) likely sub-categories as well. The paper also uses recurrent neural networks, which fall under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). Finally, the paper is specifically focused on action recognition, which is a sub-topic of multimedia (cs.MM), making it a possible sub-category as well.
